participant_1.background:
I'm looking forward to spending time with my son playing some games together.
I am a wildlife photographer, and I wear cardigans to keep warm when I'm out in the field.
i love huge paintings.
I prefer to read books to get my entertainment, so social media isn't very important to me.
i am saving up to buy a new camera.

participant_2.background:
I ate pancakes with extra syrup and bacon for my birthday breakfast.
i hate popcorn.
My kids are playing video games on a rainy day, which is a good excuse for me to practice my music.
I spend my free time working on cars and watching baseball.
i work 9 to 5 job.

content.text: Happy Birthday! Hope you had a great day!
Thank you so much! I had a lovely breakfast of pancakes with extra syrup and bacon.
That sounds delicious! I love pancakes but I am not so keen on syrup.
I hate popcorn so I always make sure to have something with syrup with my pancakes.
Oh no! I love popcorn! I could eat it all day long.
I know a lot of people who love popcorn. I just can't stand the taste of it.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to work on cars, watch baseball and play video games.
Wow, that sounds like a lot of fun! I love to read books and take pictures of animals.
I love animals too! I used to volunteer at a local animal shelter.
That's great! I'm a wildlife photographer, so I spend a lot of time in the field taking pictures of animals.
Oh wow! That must be really interesting.
It is! I love getting to see all the different animals in their natural habitats.
That sounds amazing! I'm so glad you get to do something you love for a living.
